attributes.action: call on the dangerous dogs act 1991,breed specific legislation to weaken the ban of pitbulls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned petition the prime minister to call on the dangerous dogs act 1991,breed specific legislation to weaken the ban of pitbull type dogs theses breeds shouldent be banned they are lovely dogs if well trained the matter of the fact is y and how come the pitbulls get a far more punishment but the owners get off scott free even if the goverment could weaken the ban so people would have to have a licence to own theses breeds there are far more dangerous objects out there than just dogs and hopefuly we can get the pitbulls back in the uk!!! so please if you think im right about what i said please sign this petition so we can help pitbulls once and for all
